data.lyric:
[ti:Sober]
[ar:Demi Lovato]
[al:Sober]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Sober - Demi Lovato (黛米·洛瓦托)
[00:05.55]Producer：M-Phazes/Tushar Apte/RØMANS
[00:11.11]I got no excuses
[00:13.78]For all of these goodbyes
[00:16.67]Call me when it's over
[00:19.06]'Cause I'm dying inside
[00:22.23]Wake me up when the shakes are gone
[00:25.35]And the cold sweats disappear
[00:27.94]Call me when it's over
[00:29.40]And myself has reappeared
[00:34.16]I don't know I don't know I don't know I don't know why
[00:37.10]I do it every every every time
[00:39.43]It's only when I'm lonely
[00:45.46]Sometimes I just wanna cave
[00:46.61]And I don't wanna fight
[00:48.21]I try and I try and I try and I try and I try
[00:50.99]Just hold me I'm lonely
[00:56.90]Momma I'm so sorry I'm not sober anymore
[01:02.22]And daddy please forgive me for the drinks spilled on the floor
[01:07.62]To the ones who never left me
[01:10.23]We've been down this road before
[01:12.90]I'm so sorry I'm not sober anymore
[01:29.99]I'm sorry to my future love
[01:33.19]For the man that left my bed
[01:35.41]For making love the way I saved for you inside my head
[01:41.08]And I'm sorry for the fans I lost
[01:44.54]Who watched me fall again
[01:46.89]I wanna be a role model
[01:49.41]But I'm only human
[01:53.27]I don't know I don't know I don't know I don't know why
[01:55.97]I do it every every every time
[01:58.53]It's only when I'm lonely
[02:04.53]Sometimes I just wanna cave
[02:05.93]And I don't wanna fight
[02:07.30]I try and I try and I try and I try and I try
[02:09.84]Just hold me I'm lonely
[02:15.96]Momma I'm so sorry I'm not sober anymore
[02:21.22]And daddy please forgive me for the drinks spilled on the floor
[02:26.74]To the ones who never left me
[02:29.28]We've been down this road before
[02:31.96]I'm so sorry I'm not sober anymore
[02:46.19]I'm not sober anymore
[03:00.30]I'm sorry that I'm here again
[03:03.12]I promise I'll get help
[03:05.92]It wasn't my intention
[03:08.14]I'm sorry to myself
data.trans:
[ti:Sober]
[ar:Demi Lovato]
[al:Sober]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.55]//
[00:11.11]我找不到借口
[00:13.78]为这些离别开脱
[00:16.67]事情结束之后给我电话
[00:19.06]因为我快要死心了
[00:22.23]战栗停止后叫醒我
[00:25.35]冷汗消失后叫醒我
[00:27.94]事情结束之后给我电话
[00:29.40]我又出现了
[00:34.16]我不知道 不知道 不知道 不知道为什么
[00:37.10]我每次每次每次都这样
[00:39.43]只是当我觉得孤独的时候
[00:45.46]有时我只想逃避
[00:46.61]我不想反抗
[00:48.21]我一再努力
[00:50.99]请抱紧我 我好孤独
[00:56.90]妈妈 对不起 我不再清醒了
[01:02.22]爸爸 请原谅我把酒洒在了地板上
[01:07.62]那些从未离开我的人
[01:10.23]以前我们走过这条路
[01:12.90]对不起 我不再清醒了
[01:29.99]我对不起我未来的爱人
[01:33.19]因为那个离开我的男人
[01:35.41]因为我无法像想象中那样与你缠绵了
[01:41.08]我对不起失去的粉丝
[01:44.54]他们看到我再次沉沦
[01:46.89]我想做个好榜样
[01:49.41]但我只是普通人
[01:53.27]我不知道 不知道 不知道 不知道为什么
[01:55.97]我每次每次每次都这样
[01:58.53]只是当我觉得孤独的时候
[02:04.53]有时我只想逃避
[02:05.93]我不想反抗
[02:07.30]我一再努力
[02:09.84]请抱紧我 我好孤独
[02:15.96]妈妈 对不起 我不再清醒了
[02:21.22]爸爸 请原谅我把酒洒在了地板上
[02:26.74]那些从未离开我的人
[02:29.28]以前我们走过这条路
[02:31.96]对不起 我不再清醒了
[02:46.19]我不再清醒了
[03:00.30]对不起 我又这样了
[03:03.12]我保证我会寻求帮助
[03:05.92]那不是我的本意
[03:08.14]我对不起自己
